data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Silas Wamangituka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Stuttgart.
In the minute 2, Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In Mainz, Wataru Endo (Stuttgart) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Daniel Schlager signals a throw-in for Stuttgart, close to Mainz's area.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Mainz.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 10, Daniel Schlager awards Mainz a goal kick.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal! Robin Quaison gives Mainz a 1-0 lead in Mainz.
That's a fine assist from Jean-Philippe Mateta.
Stuttgart drive upfield and Orel Mangala gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mainz defender.
In the minute 15, Stuttgart's Borna Sosa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 16, Stuttgart attack but Marc Kempf's header doesn't find the target.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Opel Arena.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 25, Jean-Paul Boetius for Mainz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Mainz.
Free kick Stuttgart.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Mainz needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz.
Daniel Schlager awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz.
Jeremiah St. Juste (Mainz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 36, Stuttgart are coming forward and Silas Wamangituka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Stuttgart are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 37, At Opel Arena, Moussa Niakhate has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Mainz.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
Daniel Schlager signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Mainz in the half of Stuttgart.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 44, Can Mainz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Stuttgart's half?
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Silas Wamangituka.
Gonzalo Castro with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick Stuttgart.
Mainz advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Schlager blows for offside.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz just outside Stuttgart's area.
Pascal Stenzel (Stuttgart) has received a yellow card from Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 53, Daniel Schlager awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Mainz.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
The match at Opel Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Karim Onisiwo, who is down injured.
In the minute 60, Mainz's Karim Onisiwo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Stuttgart take a 1-2 lead thanks to Daniel Didavi.
In the minute 61, Sasa Kalajdzic instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Mainz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 63, Mainz push forward at Opel Arena and Karim Onisiwo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Stuttgart defence.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Mainz are pushing forward but Karim Onisiwo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Stuttgart at Opel Arena.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 67, Wataru Endo of Stuttgart gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in Mainz.
Stuttgart will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Mainz.
In the minute 69, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Daniel Schlager signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Mainz's half.
Stuttgart's Orel Mangala has been booked in Mainz.
Daniel Schlager signals a Mainz throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Leandro Martins with Levin Oztunali.
In Mainz Mainz attack through Jean-Paul Boetius. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Daniel Schlager waits before resuming play because Jean-Philippe Mateta for Mainz is still down.
In the minute 74, Mainz's Levin Oztunali misses with an attempt on goal.
Daniel Schlager awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Jean-Philippe Mateta is back on the pitch.
In the minute 74, Gonzalo Castro for Stuttgart has been booked by Daniel Schlager and receives a first yellow card.
Pellegrino Matarazzo is making the team's first substitution at Opel Arena with Mateo Klimowicz replacing Gonzalo Castro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Free kick Stuttgart.
Moussa Niakhate has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 78, Stuttgart's Sasa Kalajdzic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Stuttgart.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 80, Goal! Stuttgart extend their lead to 1-3 through Mateo Klimowicz.
Great play from Silas Wamangituka to set up the goal.
Throw-in high up the field for Mainz in Mainz.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Daniel Brosinski with Jonathan Michael Burkardt. This is the second substitution made today by Achim Beierlorzer.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a second substitution, with Tanguy Coulibaly replacing Daniel Didavi.
In the minute 82, Roberto Massimo is on a sub for Silas Wamangituka for Stuttgart.
Free kick in a good position for Mainz!
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 84, Alexander Hack is replacing Jean-Paul Boetius for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In Mainz Mainz drive forward through Jean-Philippe Mateta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 85, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team has substituted Jean-Philippe Mateta with Paul Nebel. Achim Beierlorzer is thus making his fourth change.
Goal! Sasa Kalajdzic extends Stuttgart's lead to 1-4.
In the minute 87, Hamadi Al Ghaddioui is replacing Sasa Kalajdzic for Stuttgart at Opel Arena.
Pellegrino Matarazzo is making the team's fourth substitution at Opel Arena with Philipp Klement replacing Orel Mangala.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Mainz close to the penalty box.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
That's full-time at Opel Arena. The final score is 1-4.
Pascal Stenzel in Stuttgart has been yellow-carded a second time by Daniel Schlager and is being sent off.
